text:
深澈清洁 净透毛孔 C 悦享舒润净肤「膜」力
〇糅合天然冰川泥、高岭土及蒙脱士等成分，触感柔润软糯且顺滑易延展，拥有深澈吸附力，深入毛孔吸附杂质脏污，久敷不拔干，轻松清洗不费力，肌肤清爽透澈不紧绷。
€ 添加神经酰胺NP及北美金缕梅提取物，为肌肤补充水分，锁水保湿，细致毛孔，令肌肤保持水嫩光滑。
成分：水、高岭土、甘油、甲基丙二醇、辛酸/癸酸甘油三酯、聚二甲基硅氧 、C
trans:
Deep Cleansing to give you clear pores: C Enjoy the Comforting and Moisturizing “Mask” Magic-like Power
〇Combines natural glacial mud, porcelain earth and montmorillonite, etc., offering a soft, smooth, and easy-to-spread texture with deep, limpid adsorption capabilities. It dives deep into pores to adsorb impurities and dirt, without drying out when used for a long time. It’s easy to rinse off, leaving skin feeling refreshed and clear without the feeling of tightness.
€ There are Ceramide NP and North American Witch Hazel extracts to replenish kin with moisture, lock in hydration, refine pores, and keep your skin soft and smooth.
Ingredients: water, porcelain earth, glycerin, propanediol, caprylic/capric triglyceride, polydimethylsiloxane, C
